mapper.select: select district from location where province = #{province}
select count(*) from academy where upper (aca_addr) LIKE '%'||upper(#{value})||'%'
select count(*) from curriculum c, academy a where c.aca_no = a.aca_no and upper (cur_name) LIKE '%'||upper(#{value})||'%'

select count(*) from academy a, curriculum c where a.aca_no = c.aca_no and ( upper (a.aca_addr) LIKE '%'||upper(#{ADDRESS})||'%' or (c.cur_name) LIKE '%'||upper(#{curName})||'%' or upper (c.cur_content) LIKE '%'||upper(#{curContent})||'%' )

select aca_no, aca_name, aca_addr, aca_main_pic, cur_no, cur_name, cur_content, cur_main_pic from ( select row_number() over(order by a.aca_no desc) as rnum, a.aca_no, a.aca_name, a.aca_addr, a.aca_main_pic, c.cur_no, c.cur_name, c.cur_content, c.cur_main_pic from academy a, curriculum c where a.aca_no = c.aca_no and ( upper (a.aca_addr) LIKE '%'||upper(#{ADDRESS})||'%' or (c.cur_name) LIKE '%'||upper(#{curName})||'%' or upper (c.cur_content) LIKE '%'||upper(#{curContent})||'%' ) ) r where r.rnum between #{STARTROWNUMBER} and #{ENDROWNUMBER} order by aca_no desc
